div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Invoice|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `Invoice.creation` has a context of Invoice based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Invoice`.
Element `Invoice.period[x]` has a context of Invoice based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Invoice`.
Element `Invoice.lineItem.serviced[x]` has a context of Invoice.lineItem based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Invoice`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Invoice to FHIR R4 Invoice

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Invoice to FHIR R4.
